body:
#### PR description:

ECAL : DB PayloadInspector : modification for 2024 of limits for display of EcalPedestals plots (due to noise increase with integrated luminosity)

#### PR validation:

Tested in local with CondCore/Utilities/scripts/getPayloadData.py : Json file produced on a recent iov
title: ECAL : DB PayloadInspector modification
